page.title: 15Hobbies:Silton School Pupil
page.content: My name is Christopher,I am 7 years old.In my spare time I like riding my bike.I have a special bike called an MX14 which is designed for racing.My friends and I like to make ramps to jump off & we race round a track in my garden.Once on the green I jumped about 1.5 metres.I am hoping to get a helmet and some pads for my knees & elbows for my birthday to wear when I ride my bike. When Robert & Richard come outside I play football,often in goal. Once a week I go swimming to the baths at Thirsk.I have got a badge for swimming 200 metres and I am now working for my bronze badge.I have to swim 800 metres. My mum makes me go to recorder lessons after school every week.I do not enjoy this but I have to go.
